Text:
Congress continues to lag far behind the rest of the country in reopening. It is past time to rescind the mandates and welcome the American people back in the People’s House. 

Pleased to join @MikeKellyPA, @boblatta, and my colleagues on this letter. ⬇️ https://t.co/Wu25xi0toX

Happy #NationalFFAWeek! FFA continues to play an important role in developing future leaders and farmers in Michigan. I am proud to have recently supported a bipartisan resolution recognizing the integral role of FFA. https://t.co/0ddfuaJdX0
President Biden must finally deliver strong and decisive sanctions and put an end to the Nord Stream 2 pipeline to show that Putin’s contemptible actions will not be tolerated on the world stage.

Time and time again, Vladimir Putin has proven that he is nothing but a thug. There must be immediate and substantial consequences for Russia’s invasion and unprovoked attack on Ukraine’s sovereignty. The crippling sanctions that the Biden Admin promised are long overdue.
Today we celebrate our first president, George Washington,  and those who have served in our nation's highest office. Happy Presidents' Day! https://t.co/eDnKR37qCW

The border crisis continues to spiral out of control, and President Biden continues to do nothing about it. The Administration's inaction and failure to secure the border is unacceptable. https://t.co/xcHBk6AdaZ

The high cost of health care remains a constant struggle for workers and small businesses across Michigan. At yesterday’s @edlaborgop hearing, I highlighted my commonsense legislation to expand options and lower costs through association health plans. https://t.co/64wWNQN6l8

Saddened by the passing of my friend and colleague from Minnesota, @RepHagedorn. He was a faithful public servant and advocate for his constituents. My deep condolences to Jim’s family and loved ones as they mourn his loss.

This is a long overdue move. Unmask our kids and let them return to normalcy.

https://t.co/VEVWXZpaUS

With inflation at sky-high levels under President Biden, it is making it harder for families to stretch their paychecks to keep up with rapidly rising costs.

https://t.co/x4g1ANyBf0

Frank Beckmann was a legend of Michigan broadcasting. Few could match his unique talent as an interviewer, firm grasp of the issues, and special bond with his audience. I am saddened by Frank’s loss and will miss Walleye fishing with my good friend.

https://t.co/ogSyMf4ZDz

Specialist Robert Dorogi was wounded in Vietnam on December 4, 1965 and was awarded the Purple Heart Medal. Today in Jackson, I was honored to present Mr. Dorogi with a replacement of his Purple Heart in front of church family. https://t.co/1DtqxZqRKM

The inflation rate just spiked to 7.5%—the most we’ve seen in four decades. Month after month, inflation keeps soaring and hardworking families are faced with higher prices because of President Biden’s big-spending policies.

https://t.co/2g1jtZdCjs

Under President Biden, violent crime is on the rise in major cities across the country. Radical rhetoric aimed at law enforcement is dangerous and making the crime crisis worse. We need to support the police—not defund them. https://t.co/MeTSTURdLe

The emergency scheduling order for fentanyl and fentanyl-related substances is on the verge of expiring in the coming days. We need to pass the HALT Fentanyl Act and help keep these deadly drugs off our streets. There’s no time to waste. https://t.co/6k5ZrdJkPj

The @China_TaskForce released a comprehensive set of policy proposals that offer a long-term strategy to counter the Chinese Communist Party. Speaker Pelosi played politics and pushed through a far-left wish list instead. https://t.co/gmAToL0hhJ

America needs to take the China threat seriously, but this unserious bill badly misses the mark.

The last thing we need right now is a $325 billion partisan spending bill that weakens America’s economic competitiveness and concedes ground to China.

https://t.co/QTk9ksTqPX

Proud to co-sponsor the HALT Fentanyl Act and join my @HouseCommerce colleagues in continuing to sound the alarm on the fentanyl crisis. Speaker Pelosi needs to stop standing in the way of this legislation. https://t.co/cRQXbm3eqc

The Biden Administration continues to give China a pass. This bill is another Trojan horse for far-left proposals that have little to do with countering China. https://t.co/fgzqJQRfV1

Israel is not an apartheid state as @amnesty claims, and this baseless report should be widely condemned. Such demonization of Israel will exacerbate hateful acts of anti-Semitism that are already on the rise. America stands with our close ally Israel. https://t.co/IY1WBp83Si

A heavy snowstorm is expected to blanket southern Michigan over the next couple days. Please take precautions, stay off the roads if possible, and check on any neighbors in need. Be safe!

https://t.co/iupcLAKO1p

The importance of #schoolchoice and ensuring access to quality education is more critical than ever. Let’s empower parents to choose the learning environment that best meets their children’s needs. #SchoolChoiceWeek https://t.co/3RqzIe2up0

https://t.co/k3rpcspnWX

Happy Birthday, Michigan!  On this day 185 years ago, Michigan was admitted to the Union as the 26th state. https://t.co/HZ9mBbfa69

Across the country, Americans are speaking up for the sanctity of life itself—the first and foremost gift given to us. I am proud to stand with those who march and offer a voice for voiceless. #WhyWeMarch https://t.co/9h5LLjqlQr

President Biden’s first year has been one crisis after another.

Rampant inflation, supply chain backlogs, sky-high energy prices, out-of-control crime, and a historic surge at the border. 

His failed policies are making life more expensive and our communities less safe.
On issue after issue, President Biden has failed the American people during his first year in office. https://t.co/ygykgRE6UL

As our energy crisis worsens, let's not forget President Biden began his presidency by canceling the Keystone XL pipeline. Line 5 could be next.

From day one, President Biden has played politics with America’s energy security. And families in Michigan and across the country are paying the price. https://t.co/Sd2hWV6TAZ

Today, we honor and celebrate the life of Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. May his enduring message of freedom and opportunity for all continue to inspire us as a nation for generations to come. #MLKDay https://t.co/c8UnFATutK

The Supreme Court made the right decision to halt President Biden’s vaccine mandate on large workplaces. It clearly was an unconstitutional overreach that threatened the liberty and livelihoods of millions of American workers. Today, the Constitution prevailed.

At time when our country is dealing with rampant inflation and supply chain shortages, Speaker Pelosi has instead decided to rush through a 700-plus page bill to federalize elections. My statement on today's vote. ⬇

https://t.co/P2OUOTPcVU

Inflation—a tax on all Americans—has skyrocketed to the highest level in four decades. Hardworking families are facing higher prices across the board, and President Biden’s big-spending policies are making life more expensive.

https://t.co/TKuFunEKac

https://t.co/RcGg4e2Azf

President Biden’s incompetent handling of the recovery continues to hurt our economy and leave workers on the sideline. https://t.co/Mz8fCUlGzQ
School closures have taken a tremendous toll on our children. Keep schools open and students in the classroom. https://t.co/SxKMgwCTb2
This is a misguided decision. In wake of the UAW corruption scandal, greater transparency is needed to better protect dues-paying workers and their rights. https://t.co/9KCqgR5XFN

Thank you to Chief Wight and Chief McCormick for your many years of distinguished service to Monroe, and best wishes in retirement.

https://t.co/JoatU4INHh

Soaring inflation is impacting every American this holiday season, particularly those who can least afford it.

https://t.co/mpv8f9topR

The Biden border crisis keeps spiraling out of control, and the President keeps ignoring the crisis of his own making. https://t.co/I9BUBInjSH

https://t.co/QHSIxIR3P5

This week, the House passed a strong national defense bill to support our military and give our troops a pay raise. Pleased this final version included my amendment on Afghanistan accountability and removed the problematic provisions. https://t.co/HbRmBB00Nx
Just about everything costs more these days, as inflation surges to a 39-year high. Writing more blank checks is a recipe for even higher cost of living. https://t.co/mXJ3MkChaw

Inflation is spiking at a level we haven’t seen in nearly 40 years. Month after month, inflation keeps rising and President Biden’s policies are making life more expensive.

https://t.co/bfnDOiVqlO

Thank you to @boblatta, @RepJackBergman, @RepMoolenaar, @RepLisaMcClain, @RepDLesko, @RepTiffany, @RepBalderson, @RepMGriffith, @RepJeffDuncan, @RepGallagher, @RepBillJohnson, and @RepJohnJoyce for helping introducing this legislation to protect our nation's energy security.

America’s energy security should not be subject to the political whims of this Administration. Our bill would prevent President Biden from punitively shutting down safe and existing energy pipelines like Line 5 without Congressional approval.

Senator Bob Dole led an amazing life of sacrifice and service to our country. As we reflect on his incredible life, we honor his legacy and pray for Senator Dole’s family during this time of loss.

The latest disappointing jobs report reflects what most Americans already know: President Biden continues to mismanage economic recovery efforts.
https://t.co/9ggDqPpxeP
The horrifying news from Oxford High School breaks our hearts. We pray for the families who lost a loved one, those injured to recover fully, and everyone impacted by today’s devastating shooting.

Congrats to the @ChelseaBulldogs and @hudson_schools football teams on winning state championships yesterday at Ford Field! Two hard-fought wins to cap off undefeated seasons.

https://t.co/6lF59ghbUi

https://t.co/Pj1IUGTi8F
Happy Thanksgiving! Wishing you and your loved ones a most blessed day of gratitude. https://t.co/Ak7GI2Rrqh
Mr. President, stop your attacks on American energy. Tapping our strategic reserves is not a long-term policy solution. Encouraging domestic production is the path to return to energy independence.
Americans are struggling with soaring gas prices, so President Biden goes looking for political band-aids to his self-inflicted energy crisis.

This Thanksgiving, as we gather with loved ones, count our blessings, and cook our turkey dinners, our wallets will be a lot lighter. Think of it as President Biden’s #ThanksgivingTax.

Read more in my latest op-ed ⬇

https://t.co/7sdiaYp5Gr https://t.co/2K0bqK9HI6

CBO confirms: The Democrats’ math doesn’t add up. Their massive tax and spending spree is NOT fully paid for. This budget-busting boondoggle will only worsen inflation and saddle our country with greater debt.

Hiring 87,000 new IRS agents? That will lead to 1.2 million new individual audits per year. Nearly half of them would be on families making less than $75,000.

Maybe someone could ask President Biden to clarify where he stands when he’s in Michigan today? https://t.co/MY4OiEiMA3
